table.name: vtiger_solaryofoullist
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_solaryofoullist` ( `solaryofoullistid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `solaryofoul` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `block_id` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, `point` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `category_foul` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`solaryofoullistid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_solaryofoullistcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_solaryofoullistcf` ( `solaryofoullistid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`solaryofoullistid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
